column1: Childcare & Family Support Services: What was your experience like using that resource?
The program is great, I love receiving funds for my childcare costs every quarter. The $600 helps a lot. I wish there was a study room on campus that was child friendly though!
It was extremely helpful and useful, very knowledgeable. But not many resources for childcare.
I haven’t been able to attend
Very easy, Kelly seems very friendly and helpful.

I currently have an almost two year old and would like to know more about this. Gauging between work, motherhood, and school has been very challenging and taken a toll on my mental and emotional health.
